description: Try our easy to follow Quick And Easy Bolognese recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Bolognese,Low saturated fat,Low salt,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Low sugar,Sesame free,Beef,Mushroom,Quick & easy dinner,High protein,High fibre,Mince,Quick & easy lunch,Peanut free
name: Quick And Easy Bolognese Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 420g Campbell's Canned Soup Cream Of Mushroom

recipeInstructions.text: Fill a large saucepan with water and bring to the boil.

Meanwhile, heat a little oil in frying pan, add onion and mushrooms, cook, stirring occasionally, until soft. Add beef mince and cook until browned. Stir through tomato paste, Campbellâ€™s Condensed Cream of Mushroom Soup and 1/2 can water. Simmer, uncovered, for 10 minutes.
Now, add spaghetti to boiling water and cook for 8-10 minutes, or until cooked. Drain spaghetti. Serve topped with beef and mushroom sauce.
